import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { isCompositeComponentWithType } from "react-dom/test-utils"; export default function CreateBlog() { const [token, setToken] = useState(""); const headers = { "Content-Type": "application/json", }; const data = { username: "user", password: "YoxWSMLbdYP1", }; useEffect(() => { axios .post("https://wordpress.nsattu.com/wp-json/jwt-auth/v1/token", data, { headers: headers, }) .then((res) => { setToken(res.data.token); }) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); }, []); const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); let axiosConfig = { headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", Authorization: `Bearer ${token}`, }, }; var blogData = JSON.stringify({ title: event.target.elements.title.value, content: event.target.elements.content.value, acf: { author: _.isEmpty(event.target.elements.name.value) ? "Anonymous" : event.target.elements.name.value, subtext: event.target.elements.role.value, }, }); console.log(blogData); axios .post( "https://wordpress.nsattu.com/wp-json/wp/v2/posts/", blogData, axiosConfig ) .then((res) => { console.log(res.data); }) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); }; return (

üìù Publish a Blog
